keyMoments.title: Kaenboshi (Fire Star) Debut
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his Kaenboshi (Fire Star) technique for the first time, a flaming projectile that burns Luffy's shirt to free him from Miss Goldenweek's hypnosis.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the debut of one of Usopp's signature techniques and establishes him as capable of fire-based attacks.

keyMoments.title: Usopp's Strategic Plan Saves the Crew
keyMoments.description: Despite being severely injured by Mr. 5's explosive attacks, Usopp devises and executes a clever plan using Karoo and an oil-soaked rope to save his friends from the wax structure.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's role as the crew's strategist and shows his bravery despite being the physically weakest member.

abilities.description: Usopp fires a flaming projectile from his slingshot, capable of igniting targets and burning objects.

reveals.information: Can use fire-based attacks with his slingshot

keyMoments.title: Discovers Mr. 3's Candle House
keyMoments.description: Sanji stumbles upon Mr. 3's wax hideout while searching for his crewmates on Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery leads directly to Sanji's crucial encounter with Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Impersonates Mr. 3 to Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Sanji answers Crocodile's call and successfully deceives the Warlord by pretending to be Mr. 3, claiming to have killed the Straw Hats and Vivi.
keyMoments.significance: This deception prevents Crocodile from sending reinforcements and becomes one of Sanji's most important strategic contributions. Makes him the first Straw Hat to interact with the saga's main villain.

reveals.information: Demonstrates exceptional quick thinking and ability to deceive even a Warlord of the Sea

keyMoments.title: Crocodile's First Appearance (Voice Only)
keyMoments.description: Crocodile calls Mr. 3's hideout via Den Den Mushi to check on the mission to eliminate the Straw Hats and Vivi. Though only shown in shadow with his voice heard, this marks his anime debut.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the main antagonist of the Arabasta Saga and the first Warlord of the Sea in the series. Sets up the major conflict to come.

keyMoments.title: Deceived by Sanji's Impersonation
keyMoments.description: Crocodile is tricked into believing that Mr. 3 has successfully killed the Straw Hats and Vivi, not realizing he's actually speaking with Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: This deception gives the Straw Hats crucial time to escape and continue to Arabasta without immediate pursuit.

reveals.information: Mr. 0, the leader of Baroque Works, is revealed to be Crocodile, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea
Is the mastermind behind the plot to eliminate Princess Vivi and the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Freed from Miss Goldenweek's Hypnosis
keyMoments.description: Usopp successfully frees Luffy from Miss Goldenweek's Colors Trap hypnotic control by burning the painted shirt.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that hypnotic abilities can be countered and allows Luffy to rejoin the fight.

keyMoments.title: Uses Mr. 3's Hair to Light the Rope
keyMoments.description: Luffy grabs Mr. 3 by his burning three-shaped hairdo and uses it to ignite the oil-soaked rope, creating a ring of fire that melts the wax structure.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's creative problem-solving in combat and saves his trapped crewmates.

name.japanese: ミス・ゴールデンウィーク

keyMoments.title: Colors Trap Weakness Revealed
keyMoments.description: Usopp discovers that Miss Goldenweek's hypnotic Colors Trap can be broken by destroying the painted surface, freeing Luffy by burning his painted shirt.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a critical weakness in her hypnotic ability - it requires the paint to remain intact on the target.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy and Karoo
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek is defeated along with Mr. 3 when Luffy and Karoo pursue them into the forest.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Baroque Works threat on Little Garden.

affiliations.role: Officer Agent (Miss Goldenweek, partner of Mr. 3)

abilities.description: Uses colored paint to hypnotize targets and control their emotions and actions.

reveals.information: Her Colors Trap hypnosis can be broken by destroying or removing the painted surface

keyMoments.title: Hair Used as Torch by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy grabs Mr. 3's burning three-shaped hairdo and uses it to ignite the oil-soaked rope, which destroys his wax structure and frees the trapped crew members.
keyMoments.significance: Mr. 3's own appearance becomes the instrument of his defeat, showing ironic justice.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy and Karoo
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 flees with Miss Goldenweek into the forest but is ultimately defeated by Luffy and Karoo.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the complete failure of Baroque Works' mission on Little Garden.
